Package com.dp.spring.parallel.hestia.services

Class RegistrationService<T extends User>

java.lang.Object
com.dp.spring.parallel.hestia.services.RegistrationService<T>
Type Parameters:
T - a subclass of User
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdminRegistrationStrategy, CompanyManagerRegistrationStrategy, EmployeeRegistrationStrategy, HeadquartersReceptionistRegistrationStrategy
@Service public abstract class RegistrationService<T extends User> extends Object
Template pattern for the registration service, that should be implemented in different strategies.

  • Constructor Details

    • RegistrationService

      public RegistrationService()

  • Method Details

    • register

      public void register(Integer scopeId, RegistrationRequestDTO dto)
      Template for the registration process. Steps are described in the respective methods.
      Parameters:
      scopeId - the id of the resource to attach the user to (e.g. company id, headquarters id, etc.)
      dto - the data of the user to be registered

    • generatePassword

      protected String generatePassword()
      1st step of the register(Integer, RegistrationRequestDTO) template: password generation for the user to be created.
      The step is overridable.
      Returns:
      the password for the user to be registered

    • buildUser

      protected abstract T buildUser(String encodedPassword, Integer scopeId, RegistrationRequestDTO dto)
      2nd step of the register(Integer, RegistrationRequestDTO) template: building user details.
      The step must be defined via override.
      Parameters:
      encodedPassword - the encoded password generated in the 1st step
      scopeId - the id of the resource to attach the user to (e.g. company id, headquarters id, etc.)
      dto - the data of the user to be registered
      Returns:
      the details of the user to be registered

    • save

      protected void save(User user)
      3rd step of the register(Integer, RegistrationRequestDTO) template: saving user in the database.
      The step is overridable.
      Parameters:
      user - the user to be saved in the database

    • buildNotificationMessage

      protected String buildNotificationMessage(String generatedPassword, T user)
      4th step of the register(Integer, RegistrationRequestDTO) template: building notification message (default: email message).
      The step is overridable.
      Parameters:
      generatedPassword - the password as generated in the 1st step
      user - the user saved in the database
      Returns:
      the notification message

    • buildEmailNotificationMessageFromTemplate

      protected final String buildEmailNotificationMessageFromTemplate(String templatePath, String generatedPassword, T user)
      Common method for building an email notification message based on a template file in resources.
      Parameters:
      templatePath - the path of the message template file
      generatedPassword - the password as generated in the 1st step
      user - the user saved in the database
      Returns:
      the notification message

    • sendNotification

      protected void sendNotification(String message, T user)
      5th step of the register(Integer, RegistrationRequestDTO) template: sending notification (default: email notification).
      The step is overridable.
      Parameters:
      message - the notification message to be sent
      user - the user saved in the database

    • sendEmailNotification

      protected final void sendEmailNotification(String message, T user)
      Common method for sending an email notification.
      Parameters:
      message - the notification message to be sent
      user - the user saved in the database
